statement.p: Explain why the vectors \left[\begin{array}{r} 1 \\ -1 \\ 1 \\ -5 \\ -4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 1 \\ 2 \\ 0 \\ 2 \\ -6 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 4 \\ -5 \\ -6 \\ -6 \\ 2 \end{array}\right] , \text{ and } \left[\begin{array}{r} -8 \\ 6 \\ 3 \\ 19 \\ 16 \end{array}\right] are linearly dependent or linearly independent.

answer.p: The vectors \left[\begin{array}{r} 1 \\ -1 \\ 1 \\ -5 \\ -4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 1 \\ 2 \\ 0 \\ 2 \\ -6 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 4 \\ -5 \\ -6 \\ -6 \\ 2 \end{array}\right] , \text{ and } \left[\begin{array}{r} -8 \\ 6 \\ 3 \\ 19 \\ 16 \end{array}\right] are linearly dependent .
